channel.title: Java problem Please Help
channel.description:
This is my problem, no I didn't search don't flame me, if there is an answer through search just give me the link.
This is what it said when i tried playing RSC Stake
Now when I went to run.bat i get [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . . [/code]-
when i go to RSCD.jar i get
[code]Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from where I tried loading it from C:blah blah (where I had it)[/code]
My run.bat is setup as the following [code]@echo off java -classpath rscd.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/mail.jar;lib/activation.jar;lib/jmf.jar org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient pause[/code]
I have JDK, Java, Apache ant, Wampserver. It was working before, but now it isn't for some reason, IDK why, if there's any information I'm missing that would help solve this, please ask away and i'll give.
It's not just the client, same things happen on a diff private server. It has to be a problem with my Java but IDK what it could be.
Would it be better to delete all my Java and just reinstall Java?? I have no clue what to do, please help, I really want to get back into playing the servers I like.
Thanks :) -Zack

item.title: Java problem Please Help
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

learn to use the search feature and read one of the other billion threads with the answer in

item.title: Java problem Please Help
item.dc:creator: @ilovecapris ilovecapris
item.description:
@ilovecapris wrote:

Alright I’ll try un-installing java and reinstalling[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2009, 10:47:49 am[/size][hr]Ok, I removed everything that said Java in it.

Now I reinstalled Java Version 6 update 11
and
JDK Version 6 Update 11

I tried to open the servers again, and I get the same problem.

Any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

looks to me like you need the newest version of jdk.

Read full topic

item.title: Java problem Please Help
item.dc:creator: @ilovecapris ilovecapris
item.description:
@ilovecapris wrote:

This is my problem, no I didn’t search don’t flame me, if there is an answer through search just give me the link.

This is what it said when i tried playing RSC Stake

Now when I went to run.bat i get

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . . -

when i go to RSCD.jar i get

Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from where I tried loading it from C:blah blah (where I had it)

My run.bat is setup as the following

@echo off java -classpath rscd.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/mail.jar;lib/activation.jar;lib/jmf.jar org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient pause

I have JDK, Java, Apache ant, Wampserver.
It was working before, but now it isn’t for some reason, IDK why, if there’s any information I’m missing that would help solve this, please ask away and i’ll give.

It’s not just the client, same things happen on a diff private server.
It has to be a problem with my Java but IDK what it could be.

Would it be better to delete all my Java and just reinstall Java?? I have no clue what to do, please help, I really want to get back into playing the servers I like.

Thanks
-Zack

Read full topic
